Articles.Content: Pre-ordered the game a few weeks ago, just have a problem. I have a few men still in orbit, is there a way to dock with another craft. Please, I have already lost a few kerbs in explosions. Anyway, hello everyone.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Admiral Sordid

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome!

There is docking set for .15 (next update), but you can use landing legs for docking!
Yep, it\'s best just to drag them through the atmosphere and don\'t tell them until they\'ve landed.
